verses.verse: <S%G5279>Remind<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> to <S%G5279>be<s%> in subjection <S%G5293>to<s%> <S%G5293>rulers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1849>authorities,<s%> to be <S%G3980>obedient,<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work,<s%>

to speak <S%G987>evil<s%> of no <S%G3367>one,<s%> not to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G269>contentious,<s%> to be <S%G1933>gentle,<s%> <S%G1731>showing<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4236>humility<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>

<S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G235>ourselves,<s%> but according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> he <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3067>washing<s%> of <S%G3824>regeneration<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G342>renewing<s%> by the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%>

<S%G2443>that,<s%> being <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G1565>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%> we might be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2818>heirs<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

This <S%G3056>saying<s%> is <S%G4103>faithful,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> concerning these <S%G5130>things<s%> I <S%G1014>desire<s%> <S%G1226>that<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> affirm <S%G1226>confidently,<s%> so <S%G2443>that<s%> those who have <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> may be <S%G5431>careful<s%> to <S%G4291>maintain<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works.<s%> These <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5624>profitable<s%> to <S%G444>men;<s%>

<S%G3752>When<s%> I <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G734>Artemas<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4571>you,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5190>Tychicus,<s%> be <S%G4704>diligent<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3533>Nicopolis,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I have <S%G2919>determined<s%> to <S%G3914>winter<s%> <S%G1563>there.<s%>

<S%G4311>Send<s%> <S%G2211>Zenas,<s%> the <S%G3544>lawyer,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G625>Apollos<s%> on their <S%G4311>journey<s%> <S%G4709>speedily,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> may be <S%G3007>lacking<s%> for <S%G846>them.<s%>
